meanings.definition: Following the classical period in Mesoamerican history.
meanings.sent1: The postclassic era brought new innovations to Mesoamerican civilizations.
meanings.sent2: The postclassic architecture in the region showed a blend of traditional and modern styles.
meanings.sent3: In the postclassic times, people started using different materials for building.
meanings.sent4: Her postclassic approach to cooking combined ancient recipes with contemporary techniques.
meanings.sent5: The postclassic artworks were vibrant and full of cultural symbolism.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the period following the classical period.
meanings.sent1: The postclassic fashion trends reflected a mix of old and new styles.
meanings.sent2: His postclassic music compositions were a fusion of classical and modern elements.
meanings.sent3: The postclassic party had a theme of blending past and present decorations.
meanings.sent4: She had a postclassic way of thinking that embraced both tradition and innovation.
meanings.sent5: The postclassic literature explored themes of change and continuity.

meanings.definition: A style or period in art or literature following the classical period.
meanings.sent1: The postclassic in art showcased a departure from traditional forms.
meanings.sent2: Many poets of the postclassic focused on themes of evolution and progress.
meanings.sent3: The postclassic of literature was marked by a shift towards more experimental writing.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the postclassic allowed artists to break free from established norms.
meanings.sent5: Studying the postclassic period reveals a rich tapestry of cultural expression.
